info.title: Window Dialog Frame
info.description: Creates a dialog frame popup to display content to the user and perform an action.

prop.name: formFactory
prop.description: A formFactory object for building the form input objects.

prop.name: formContent
prop.description: The form container that contains the form inputs.

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the frame along with the form action.

parameter.name: $action
parameter.description: The form action to post the dialog to. Leave empty in order to engage with module or application protocol. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $background
parameter.description: Defines whether the dialog popup will have a background. It is TRUE by default, as a dialog.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The dialog buttons type. Use class constants to define an OK/Cancel or Yes/No type. Default type is OK/Cancel.

method.name: getFormFactory
method.description: Get the frame's form factory object.

method.name: engageModule
method.description: Engage this frame to post to a given module view.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to post to.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name to post to. If empty, gets the default module view. It is empty by default.

method.name: engageApp
method.description: Engage this dialog frame to post to a given view of the current application.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The app's view name to post to. If empty, gets the default app view. It is empty by default.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends a given element to the dialogFrame form container.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The dialog buttons type. Use class constants to define an OK/Cancel or Yes/No type. Default type is OK/Cancel.
